mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Vote (animalId, memberId , recruitStartDate, recruitEndDate , voteStartDate, voteEndDate) VALUES( #{animalId}, #{memberId} , current_date(), DATE_ADD(current_date(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) , DATE_ADD(current_date(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) , DATE_ADD(current_date(), INTERVAL 9 DAY) )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Vote ORDER BY recruitStartDate DESC LIMIT 1
